QuestData.Title: Something Wonderful
QuestData.Description:
$n, I am so glad you are here! Firim sent me to find you.
It's the oracle, it... well... it's hard to describe. You should come see it for yourself. Hurry!
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Exile's Hollow to witness for yourself what is happening to Saezurah.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Travel to Exile's Hollow to consult with Firim.
QuestData.RewardText: We may be on the cusp of a wondrous revelation!
